description:
This is a two bedroom apartment on the 3rd floor of a walk-up building on the Upper West Side of Manhattan. The apartment is blocks from The Museum of Natural History, Central Park, Riverside Park, the 86th Street 1, B, C trains, restaurants like The Mermaid Inn, Barney Greengrass, and ten minutes to Times Square. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood and the coziness.

-2 bedroom apartment: living room, two bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen
-One bedroom has a full bed which can each sleep up to two (depending on size) and one bedroom has a queen bed. 
-The apartment is on the 3rd floor of a walk-up near West 86th Street
-TV in the living room and one of the bedrooms with cable in both rooms, DVR in living room, Roku w/Netflix, Hulu etc. 
-WiFi throughout apartment
-oven/stove/microwave/refrigerator/freezer for use
-towels, sheets, blankets, iron, dishes, pots, pans provided
-there is no coffee maker in the apartment, but Starbucks and Dunkin Donuts are both around the corner. 
-no laundry in the building, but there is same-day drop-off service around the corner.

I will be available at all times via text/phone/e-mail and in person if needed.
name: Cozy Two Bedroom Apartment on Upper West Side
review: Great location.  Perfect for four of us.  Caitlin is very easy to communicate with.
